# Square Root of 2π

> Square root of the mathematical constant [π][pi] times 2.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var SQRT_TWO_PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-two-pi' );
```

#### SQRT_TWO_PI

Square root of the mathematical constant [π][pi] times `2`.

``` javascript
SQRT_TWO_PI === 2.5066282746310007;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var SQRT_TWO_PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-two-pi' );

console.log( SQRT_TWO_PI );
// => 2.5066282746310007
```

</section>
